thread.title: Pompeo: U.S. to impose 'strongest' sanctions on Iran

title: Pompeo: U.S. to impose 'strongest' sanctions on Iran
text:
Pompeo: U.S. to impose 'strongest' sanctions on Iran 4:53pm BST - 01:20
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo on Monday threatened to impose the “strongest sanctions in history” against Iran if the country’s leadership did not change the course of its foreign and domestic policy. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo on Monday threatened to impose the “strongest sanctions in history” against Iran if the country’s leadership did not change the course of its foreign and domestic policy.
